cost.csv.wasCached.comment: CSV column header for cache enabled status

cost.csv.cacheHit.comment: CSV column header for cache hit status

cost.csv.originalCost.comment: CSV column header for original cost before cache savings

cost.csv.page.comment: CSV column header for phase name

cost.csv.projectId.comment: CSV column header for project ID

cost.csv.chapterId.comment: CSV column header for chapter ID

cost.csv.segmentId.comment: CSV column header for segment ID

cost.csv.exportTitle.string: Khipu Studio - Cost Tracking Data Export

cost.csv.exportDate.comment: Export date label in CSV file header

cost.csv.totalEntries.comment: Total entries label in CSV file header

cost.csv.dateRange.comment: Date range label in CSV file header

cost.csv.dataFormat.comment: Data format label in CSV file header

cost.csv.yes.comment: Yes value for boolean fields in CSV

cost.csv.no.comment: No value for boolean fields in CSV
